src_original: ūrdhvā ca adharā ca madhyamā ca ūrdhvādhomadhyamāḥ /  tistraḥ kiṃ? bhūmayaḥ /  kasya? salilasya /
śuddhimāyāti yā yā bhūriti /  āsāṃ tisṛṇāmapi bhūmīnāṃ madhye yā yā bhūḥ śuddhimāyāti niḥ prāṇakā bhavati,  kāryaṃ kuryāttayā /  yatra ityādi /  yasyāṃ nadyāṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ vā,
tgt_original: 若下分無蟲，中分、上分有蟲者，應取下分無蟲水用； 若中分無蟲，上分下分有蟲者，應取中分水用；

src_original: sthūlā mahāntaḥ prāṇakā karatalahatāḥ hastena hatāḥ santaḥ adhaḥ sthalaṃ yānti tatra jalaṃ grahītavyaṃ,  na cet srāvayitavyamiti /  cecchabdo yadyarthe /
tgt_original: 若上分無蟲，應取上分水用。

src_original: yadi karatalāhatāḥ santaḥ prāṇino 'dho [na] yānti tadā srāvayitavyaṃ tadudakaṃ /  kayā? pañcāṅgulikayā /
tgt_original: 若上分有蟲者，應以手拍水，令蟲入水底已取用。
若三分盡有蟲者，爾時應漉水用。

src_original: yasminnudake prāṇinaḥ kare lagnā uttiṣṭhanti na tatra pāṇipādāsyavastrādikaṃ kṣālayedyatiriti /  āsyaṃ mukhaṃ /  sugamatvānna vibhaktaṃ //
tgt_original: 若水中蟲極細微者，不得就用洗手面及大小行。

src_original: kule ityādi //  kule yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ bhojanāya nimantritaḥ,
tgt_original: 若檀越家請比丘食，爾時應問：

src_original: tena tatra gatvā praṣṭavyaṃ- kimatra jalaṃ srāvitaṃ na veti /
yaḥ srāvaṇāya kuśalaḥ sa vaktavyaḥ /  kimiti /  etatsaprāṇakaṃ jalaṃ srāvayeti /  itaro na tu /
tgt_original: 「未漉。 」應看前人是可信者，應教漉水。

src_original: yaḥ stha[vi]rataraḥ parisrāvayituṃ na jānāti,  sa srāvayeti na vaktavyaḥ /  yaḥ vakti, tasya duṣkṛtaṃ syāt /
tgt_original: 若不可信者，不得語令漉，莫傷殺蟲。

src_original: yadi tathaiko 'pi srāvaṇāya kuśalo na bhavati,  tadā kiṃ kartavyaṃ ityāha /  kintu snāvyamiti vistaraḥ /  srāvyāt parisrāvaṇāt /  sajantukajalamātmīyapātre muktvā kutaḥ punaretadudakamānītamiti pṛṣṭaṃ yataḥ puṣkariṇyāderānītaṃ tatraiva muñcetsvayamiti /
tgt_original: 比丘應自漉用，蟲水應著自器中，應問： 「從何處取水？

src_original: mā bhūdanyatra kṣāraṃ nīramupaghātakṛtaṃ prāṇināmiti tatraivetyāha /
saptāhaṃ vetyādi /  athavā yatra sapta divasān pānīyamavatiṣṭhati tatra tat saprāṇakamudakaṃ moktavyaṃ /  athavā vihāre kaṭāhādau tatra sthāpayet /
tgt_original: 若先取水處遠者，若見有池水，七日內不消盡者，得以蟲水著中。

src_original: kīdṛgvidha ityāha /  tadaśuṣyati /  tat pānīyaṃ tatra śoṣaṃ nopaiti /  tasminnaśuṣyati kaṭāhādau sthāpayet /  kecittadaśuṣyati tatra pānīyāśoṣaṇaṃ nimittamiti nimittasaptamīṃ varṇayanti /
tgt_original: 若無池水者，當器中盛水持來養之。

src_original: pravṛṣṭetyādi /  kīdṛśe? svacchanīraughavāhini /  nīraughaṃ jalaughaṃ voḍhuṃ śīlaṃ yasyeti bhāvaḥ /  svacchanīraughavāhī /  tasminnīdṛgvidhe vṛṣṭe sati tāni [sa]prāṇakāni jalāni nimnagānāṃ patiṃ mahāsamudrapātaṅgacchateti uktvā visarjayet /
tgt_original: 若天大雨有瀑流水，以蟲瀉中，作是念言：
